chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: The eSciDoc Infrastructure Java Client Library (short: client-lib) shall smooth the way for Java programmer to implement application on top of the eSciDoc Infrastructure.
Each version of the eSciDoc Infrastructure Java Client Library supports a specific version of the eSciDoc Infrastructure. The supported version of the infrastructure is shown within the package name.
This version of the client lib supports only eSciDoc Infrastructures in version 1.2[.x]. The compatibility with update versions of the 1.2 series should be given.
A client lib for version 1.2 is definitely not compatible with eSciDoc Infrastructure version 1.0 or 1.1.

The infrastructure delivers XML representation to support programming language independent client applications. Programming with Java means usually to work with classes. This client lib could hide all required steps of mapping between XML representation and classes. Who does not need the mapping feature can still benefit from the method stubs and the hidden transport.

The client lib contains only little logic and does therefore give only little support to compile required values. Parameter and data structure checking is done by the infrastructure to avoid a duplication of logic. Nevertheless, make it POJOs easier to explore settable values.
